effects.tier1: 7 damage; the griffon can shift 1 square
effects.tier2: 10 damage; the griffon shifts up to 2 squares
effects.tier3: 13 damage; the griffon shifts up to 3 squares

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If this ability is used as part of the Charge main action, the griffon can grab one of the targets.

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: The griffon must be flying and must have a creature or object grabbed.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The griffon flies up to half their speed toward the ground, then sends the creature or object they've grabbed hurtling down. The creature or object hits the ground to turn the area into an impact crater, and takes falling damage that can't be reduced in any way.

items.name: Wing Buffet
items.target: Each creature or object in the area

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: A target object must be size 2 or smaller.

effects.tier1: Push 3; A<0 the forced movement is vertical
effects.tier2: Push 4; A<1 the forced movement is vertical
effects.tier3: Push 5; A<2 the forced movement is vertical

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The griffon halves the damage, ignores any nondamaging effects associated with it, and shifts up to 2 squares.
While grabbed by the griffon, a creature has a double bane on the Escape Grab maneuver.
Any power roll that could knock the griffon or their rider prone takes a bane.
